title: Coffeepot with Tray
text: This coffee pot and tray combine the attenuated form of a Turkish coffee pot with a distinctly Western, thistle motif. This design, in production for several years, was described in 1890 as an "after dinner coffee pot and tray."
description: coffee pot, has a matching tray, pattern of thistles and thistle leaves
creditline: Gift of funds from the Decorative Arts Council
